items.name: Antidote (Lesser)
items.text: An antidote protects you against toxins. Upon drinking an antidote, you gain an item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 6 hours. You gain a +2 item bonus.

items.name: Antidote (Moderate)
items.text: An antidote protects you against toxins. Upon drinking an antidote, you gain an item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 6 hours. You gain a +3 item bonus.

items.name: Antidote (Greater)
items.text: An antidote protects you against toxins. Upon drinking an antidote, you gain an item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 6 hours. You gain a +4 item bonus.

items.name: Antidote (Major)
items.text: An antidote protects you against toxins. Upon drinking an antidote, you gain an item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 6 hours. You gain a +4 item bonus, and when you drink the antidote, you can immediately attempt a saving throw against one poison of 14th level or lower affecting you. If you succeed, the poison is neutralized.

items.name: Antiplague (Lesser)
items.text: Antiplague can fortify the body's defenses against diseases. Upon drinking an antiplague, you gain an item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression. You gain a +2 item bonus.

items.name: Antiplague (Moderate)
items.text: Antiplague can fortify the body's defenses against diseases. Upon drinking an antiplague, you gain an item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression. You gain a +3 item bonus.

items.name: Antiplague (Greater)
items.text: Antiplague can fortify the body's defenses against diseases. Upon drinking an antiplague, you gain an item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression. You gain a +4 item bonus.

items.name: Antiplague (Major)

You gain a +4 item bonus, and when you drink the antiplague, you can immediately attempt a saving throw against one disease of 14th level or lower affecting you. If you succeed, you are cured of the disease.

items.name: Cheetah's Elixir (Lesser)

items.name: Cheetah's Elixir (Moderate)
items.text: Enzymatic compounds in this elixir strengthen and excite the muscles in your legs. You gain a status bonus to your Speed for the listed duration. The bonus is +10 feet, and the duration is 10 minutes.

items.name: Cheetah's Elixir (Greater)
items.text: Enzymatic compounds in this elixir strengthen and excite the muscles in your legs. You gain a status bonus to your Speed for the listed duration. The bonus is +10 feet, and the duration is 1 hour.

items.name: Elixir of Life (Minor)
items.text: Elixirs of life accelerate the body's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain the listed number of Hit Points and gain an item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes. The elixir restores 1d6 Hit Points, and the bonus is +1.

items.name: Elixir of Life (Moderate)

items.name: Elixir of Life (Greater)

items.name: Elixir of Life (Major)

items.name: Lastwall Soup
items.text: Crimson Reclaimers make this rich, hearty soup using herbs that baffle the senses of the undead. A bowl of Lastwall soup is as nourishing as a full meal. In addition, for 1 hour after consuming a bowl of Lastwall soup, you gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks and DCs against undead.

items.name: Leaper's Elixir (Lesser)
items.text: This tingly solution increases the elasticity and contraction of your leg muscles. For 1 minute after drinking this elixir, you can High Jump or Long Jump as a single action instead of 2 actions. If you do, you don't perform the initial Stride (nor do you fail if you don't Stride 10 feet).

items.name: Leaper's Elixir (Greater)
items.text: This tingly solution increases the elasticity and contraction of your leg muscles. For 1 minute after drinking this elixir, you can High Jump or Long Jump as a single action instead of 2 actions. If you do, you don't perform the initial Stride (nor do you fail if you don't Stride 10 feet). The maximum vertical distance you can jump with a High Jump is the same as you can jump horizontally with a Long Jump.

items.name: Bestial Mutagen (Lesser)
items.text: Your features transform into something bestial and you take on muscle mass, but your lumbering form is clumsy. You gain a +1 item bonus, your claw deals 1d4 slashing damage, your jaws deal 1d6 piercing damage, and the duration is 1 minute.
items.benefit: You gain an item bonus to Athletics checks and unarmed attack rolls. You gain a claw unarmed attack with the agile trait and a jaws unarmed attack.
items.drawback: You take a –1 penalty to AC and a –2 penalty to Reflex saves.

items.name: Bestial Mutagen (Moderate)
items.text: Your features transform into something bestial and you take on muscle mass, but your lumbering form is clumsy. You gain a +2 item bonus, your claw deals 1d6 slashing damage, your jaws deal 1d8 piercing damage, and the duration is 10 minutes.
items.benefit: You gain an item bonus to Athletics checks and unarmed attack rolls. You gain a claw unarmed attack with the agile trait and a jaws unarmed attack.
items.drawback: You take a –1 penalty to AC and a –2 penalty to Reflex saves.

items.name: Bestial Mutagen (Greater)

items.name: Cognitive Mutagen (Lesser)
items.text: Your mind becomes clear and cognition flows freely, but physical matters seem ephemeral. The bonus is +1, and the duration is 1 minute.
items.benefit: You gain an item bonus to Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Occultism, and Society checks and all checks to Recall Knowledge. Your critical failures on Recall Knowledge checks become failures instead.
items.drawback: You take a –2 penalty to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, Athletics checks, and Acrobatics checks. You can carry 2 less Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered, and the maximum Bulk you can carry is reduced by 4.

items.name: Cognitive Mutagen (Moderate)
items.text: Your mind becomes clear and cognition flows freely, but physical matters seem ephemeral. The bonus is +2, and the duration is 10 minutes.

items.name: Cognitive Mutagen (Greater)
items.text: Your mind becomes clear and cognition flows freely, but physical matters seem ephemeral. The bonus is +3, and the duration is 1 hour. You become trained in one Intelligence-based skill, chosen at creation.
items.benefit: You gain an item bonus to Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Occultism, and Society checks and all checks to Recall Knowledge. Your critical failures on Recall Knowledge checks become failures instead.
items.drawback: You take a –2 penalty to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, Athletics checks, and Acrobatics checks. You can carry 2 less Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered, and the maximum Bulk you can carry is reduced by 4.

items.name: Eagle Eye Elixir (Lesser)
items.text: After you drink this elixir, you notice subtle visual details. For the next hour, you gain an item bonus to Perception checks that is greater when attempting to find secret doors and traps. The bonus is +1, or +2 to find secret doors and traps.

items.name: Eagle Eye Elixir (Moderate)
items.text: After you drink this elixir, you notice subtle visual details. For the next hour, you gain an item bonus to Perception checks that is greater when attempting to find secret doors and traps. The bonus is +2, or +3 to find secret doors and traps.

items.name: Eagle Eye Elixir (Greater)
items.text: After you drink this elixir, you notice subtle visual details. For the next hour, you gain an item bonus to Perception checks that is greater when attempting to find secret doors and traps. The bonus is +3, or +4 to find secret doors and traps.

items.name: Eagle Eye Elixir (Major)
items.text: After you drink this elixir, you notice subtle visual details. For the next hour, you gain an item bonus to Perception checks that is greater when attempting to find secret doors and traps. The bonus is +3, or +4 to find secret doors and traps. Each time you pass within 10 feet of a secret door or trap, the GM automatically rolls a secret check for you to find it.

items.name: Energy Mutagen (Lesser)
items.text: When created, this mutagen is attuned to your choice of one of four energy types: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. When consumed, the mutagen suffuses your body with energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. At higher levels, it can even grant you the ability to unleash the energy in controlled bursts. You gain resistance 5, add 1 point of damage on a hit with a melee weapon, and the duration is 1 minute.
items.benefit: You gain resistance to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add the listed amount of damage of the attuned energy type.
items.drawback: You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

items.name: Energy Mutagen (Moderate)

When consumed, the mutagen suffuses your body with energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. At higher levels, it can even grant you the ability to unleash the energy in controlled bursts. You gain resistance 10, add 1d4 damage on a hit with a melee weapon, and the duration is 10 minutes.
items.benefit: You gain resistance to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add the listed amount of damage of the attuned energy type.
items.drawback: You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

In addition, you can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals 2d6 damage of the attuned type for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 25 basic Reflex save).

items.benefit: You gain an item bonus to Fortitude saves and the listed number of temporary Hit Points. Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points.
items.drawback: You take a –2 penalty to Will saves, Perception checks, and initiative rolls.

items.name: Quicksilver Mutagen (Lesser)

items.benefit: You gain an item bonus to Acrobatics checks, Stealth checks, Thievery checks, Reflex saves, and ranged attack rolls, and you gain the listed status bonus to your Speed.
items.drawback: You take damage equal to twice your level; you can't recover Hit Points lost in this way by any means while the mutagen lasts. You take a –2 penalty to Fortitude saves.

items.drawback: You take a –1 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a –1 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack, and spell damage.

items.benefit: You gain an item bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance checks. Your critical failures with any of these skill become failures instead.
items.drawback: You take a –2 item penalty to Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Occultism, and Society checks. Choose one skill in which you are trained; for the duration, you become untrained in that skill. All your failures on checks to Recall Knowledge become critical failures.

items.name: Darkvision Elixir (Lesser)
items.text: After you drink this elixir, your sight becomes sharper in darkness. You gain darkvision for the listed duration. The duration is 10 minutes.

items.name: Darkvision Elixir (Moderate)
items.text: After you drink this elixir, your sight becomes sharper in darkness. You gain darkvision for the listed duration. The duration is 1 hour.

items.name: Darkvision Elixir (Greater)
items.text: After you drink this elixir, your sight becomes sharper in darkness. You gain darkvision for the listed duration. The duration is 24 hours.

items.name: Infiltrator's Elixir
items.text: Favored by spies and tricksters, an infiltrator's elixir is used to alter your appearance. When imbibed, you take the shape of a humanoid creature of your size, but different enough so you might be unrecognizable. If you aren't a humanoid, you might take on a form more similar to your own, at the GM's discretion. The creator of the elixir decides the basics of the appearance you transform into when you imbibe the elixir, including eye color, skin tone, and hair color. The elixir can't change your form into that of a specific person. After the form takes hold, you retain it for the next 10 minutes. Drinking this elixir counts as setting up a disguise to Impersonate. You gain a +4 status bonus to your Deception DC to avoid others seeing through your disguise, and you add your level to this DC even if untrained.

items.name: Bravo's Brew (Lesser)
items.text: This flask of foaming beer grants courage. For the next hour after drinking this elixir, you gain an item bonus to Will saves, which is greater when attempting Will saves against fear. The bonus on Will saves is +1, or +2 against fear.

items.name: Bravo's Brew (Moderate)
items.text: This flask of foaming beer grants courage. For the next hour after drinking this elixir, you gain an item bonus to Will saves, which is greater when attempting Will saves against fear. The bonus on Will saves is +2, or +3 against fear.

items.name: Bravo's Brew (Greater)
items.text: This flask of foaming beer grants courage. For the next hour after drinking this elixir, you gain an item bonus to Will saves, which is greater when attempting Will saves against fear. The bonus on Will saves is +3, or +4 against fear. If you roll a success on a save against fear, you get a critical success instead.

items.name: Cat's Eye Elixir
items.text: After you consume this elixir, your vision sharpens and you become sensitive to even the most minute movements. For the next minute, you reduce the flat check to target hidden creatures to 5, and you don't need to attempt a flat check to target concealed creatures. These benefits apply only against creatures within 30 feet of you.

items.name: Comprehension Elixir (Lesser)
items.text: This bitter draught opens your mind to the potential of the written word. For the listed duration after drinking this elixir, you can understand any words you read, so long as they are written in a common language. This elixir doesn't automatically allow you to understand codes or extremely esoteric passages—you still need to attempt a skill check to Decipher Writing. The duration is 1 minute.

items.name: Comprehension Elixir (Greater)
items.text: This bitter draught opens your mind to the potential of the written word. For the listed duration after drinking this elixir, you can understand any words you read, so long as they are written in a common language. This elixir doesn't automatically allow you to understand codes or extremely esoteric passages—you still need to attempt a skill check to Decipher Writing. The duration is 10 minutes.

items.name: Stone Fist Elixir
items.text: Your fists become hard as stone. For 1 hour, your fists deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage and lose the nonlethal trait.

items.name: Bomber's Eye Elixir (Lesser)
items.text: This tincture lets you pinpoint your foes. For the next 5 minutes, your alchemical bomb Strikes reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your targets gain from cover. Reduce your targets' circumstance bonus by 1.

items.name: Bomber's Eye Elixir (Greater)
items.text: This tincture lets you pinpoint your foes. For the next 5 minutes, your alchemical bomb Strikes reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your targets gain from cover. Reduce your targets' circumstance bonus by 2.

items.name: Salamander Elixir (Lesser)
items.text: This elixir is made from salamander scales to withstand fire. For 24 hours, you are protected from the effects of severe heat.

items.name: Salamander Elixir (Moderate)
items.text: This elixir is made from salamander scales to withstand fire. For 24 hours, you are protected from the effects of severe heat. You're also protected from extreme heat.

items.name: Salamander Elixir (Greater)
items.text: This elixir is made from salamander scales to withstand fire. For 24 hours, you are protected from the effects of severe heat. You're also protected from extreme and incredible heat.

items.name: Winter Wolf Elixir (Lesser)
items.text: This elixir warms your core and improves your circulation. For 24 hours, you are protected from the effects of severe cold.

items.name: Winter Wolf Elixir (Moderate)
items.text: This elixir warms your core and improves your circulation. For 24 hours, you are protected from the effects of severe cold. You're also protected from extreme cold.

items.name: Winter Wolf Elixir (Greater)
items.text: This elixir warms your core and improves your circulation. For 24 hours, you are protected from the effects of severe cold. You're also protected from extreme and incredible cold.

items.name: Mistform Elixir (Lesser)
items.text: A faint mist emanates from your skin, making you concealed for the listed duration. As usual being concealed when your position is still obvious, you can't use this concealment to Hide or Sneak . The duration is 3 rounds.

items.name: Mistform Elixir (Moderate)
items.text: A faint mist emanates from your skin, making you concealed for the listed duration. As usual being concealed when your position is still obvious, you can't use this concealment to Hide or Sneak . The duration is 1 minute.

items.name: Mistform Elixir (Greater)
items.text: A faint mist emanates from your skin, making you concealed for the listed duration. As usual being concealed when your position is still obvious, you can't use this concealment to Hide or Sneak . The duration is 5 minutes.

items.name: Sea Touch Elixir (Lesser)
items.text: This briny concoction alters the skin on your hands and feet. The spaces between your fingers and toes become webbed, granting you a swim Speed of 20 feet for the listed duration. The duration is 10 minutes.

items.name: Sea Touch Elixir (Moderate)
items.text: This briny concoction alters the skin on your hands and feet. The spaces between your fingers and toes become webbed, granting you a swim Speed of 20 feet for the listed duration. The duration is 1 hour, and you can breathe underwater.

items.name: Sea Touch Elixir (Greater)
items.text: This briny concoction alters the skin on your hands and feet. The spaces between your fingers and toes become webbed, granting you a swim Speed of 20 feet for the listed duration. The duration is 24 hours, and you can breathe underwater.

items.name: Stone Body Mutagen (Lesser)
items.text: This mutagen calcifies your body making it as hard as stone. You gain resistance 5 to physical damage (except bludgeoning) and the duration is 10 minutes.
items.benefit: You gain resistance to physical damage (except bludgeoning) equal to the listed amount.
items.drawback: Your Speeds are reduced by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet) and you take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves.

items.name: Stone Body Mutagen (Moderate)
items.text: This mutagen calcifies your body making it as hard as stone. You gain resistance 5 to physical damage (except bludgeoning) and the duration is 1 hour.
items.benefit: You gain resistance to physical damage (except bludgeoning) equal to the listed amount.
items.drawback: Your Speeds are reduced by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet) and you take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves.

items.name: Stone Body Mutagen (Greater)
items.benefit: You gain resistance to physical damage (except bludgeoning) equal to the listed amount.
items.drawback: Your Speeds are reduced by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet) and you take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves.
items.text: This mutagen calcifies your body making it as hard as stone. You gain resistance 10 to physical damage (except bludgeoning) and the duration is 1 hour.

items.name: Elixir of Rejuvenation
items.text: The elixir of rejuvenation restores a creature to full health and eradicates toxins affecting it. When you drink this elixir, you're restored to your maximum Hit Points, and all afflictions of 20th level or lower affecting you are removed. You can instead administer this elixir to a creature that has been dead for a week or less. When you do, that creature is instantly brought back to life with 1 Hit Point and no spell slots, Focus Points, or other daily resources. true elixir of life

items.name: Sun Orchid Elixir
items.text: When you drink this elixir, you physically become as you were in whatever phase of your youth you desire. Your new body begins in peak health, regardless of what your actual condition was at that age. Any physical or mental imperfections— including scars, lost limbs, and curses, diseases, poisons of 20th level or lower— are removed, and you regain your full Hit Points. You immediately begin to age normally again, with your natural lifespan extended as if you had never aged past your new apparent age. You retain all your memories. Unlike Crafting most items, brewing the sun orchid elixir takes 1 month's time. While an individual vial of sun orchid elixir isn't unique, the formula is unique, and it's known only to Artokus Kirran of Thuvia.
